alert.note: Alert for Dearborn (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 2:53PM EDT until July 02 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN DEARBORN COUNTY... At 252 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bright, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Bright, Logan, Manchester, Sunman, St. Leon, Dover, Weisburg, Lawrenceville and New Alsace. This includes I-74 in Indiana between mile markers 158 and 167. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
